src:
Jadwal Lengkap Liga Europa Hari Ini, Siaran Langsung di SCTV
07 Nov 2019, 14:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Jadwal lengkap pekan ke-4 Liga Europa musim 2019/2020. Salah satu laga yang akan dimainkan adalah Manchester United vs Partizan di Old Trafford pada Jumat (8/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Manchester United kini berada di puncak klasemen Grup L dengan meraih 7 poin. Sedangkan, Partizan berada di posisi ke-3 dengan meraih 4 poin. United butuh kemenangan untuk membuka kans lolos ke babak 32 Besar Liga Europa.
Selain duel Manchester United vs Partizan Belgrade, ada laga seru antara Lazio vs Celtic. Sebagai tuan rumah, Lazio sangat membutuhkan tiga poin. Sebab, Lazio kini berada di posisi ke-3 klasemen dan baru mendapatkan tiga poin. Sedangkan, Celtic di puncak klasemen dengan tujuh poin.
Klub Italia lain, AS Roma, harus menjalani lawatan sulit ke markas Borussia Monchengladbach. Lawan yang dihadapi Roma adalah tim yang sedang berada di puncak klasemen Bundesliga. Namun, gladbach meraih hasil buruk di Liga Europa sejauh ini.

Simak jadwal lengkap pekan ke-4 Liga Europa di bawah ini ya Bolaneters.
text:
Today's Europa League Complete Schedule, Live Broadcast on SCTV
Nov 7 2019, 14:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Complete schedule for Week 4 of the Europa League 2019/2020 season. One match that will be played is Manchester United vs Partizan at Old Trafford on Friday (11/08/2019) early morning hrs.
Manchester United are now top of Group L by winning 7 points. Meanwhile, Partizan came in 3rd place with 4 points. United need a victory to open a chance to qualify for the last 32 of the Europa League.
In addition to the Manchester United vs Partizan Belgrade duel, there is an exciting match between Lazio vs Celtic. As the host, Lazio really need three points. Because, Lazio are now in the 3rd position of the standings and only get three points. Meanwhile, Celtic at the top of the standings with seven points.
Another Italian club, AS Roma, must undergo a difficult trip to Borussia Monchengladbach's headquarters. Opponents faced by Rome are the team that is at the top of the Bundesliga standings. However, gladbach has achieved poor results in the Europa League so far.

Check out the full schedule for Week 4 of the Europa League below, Bolaneters.
